alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 2:49AM CDT until April 23 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CDT FOR BEAVER...EASTERN TEXAS AND NORTHERN LIPSCOMB COUNTIES... At 248 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Kismet to 3 miles northwest of Turpin to 8 miles south of Hardesty, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver, Forgan, Hardesty, Gate, Knowles, Elmwood, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
